"The password you entered is not valid"
"Access to the camera is required to take pictures and video for sharing."
"Access to the camera and the file system are used to attach media to your messages."
"The app needs \"Camera\" and \"Storage\" permission for attachments. One or more of those permissions has been denied."
"Access to read files is required for sharing photos and videos."
"Access to write files is required for sharing photos and videos."
"Record Audio permission is needed for voice messages."
"Access to the microphone and the file system are used to send voice messages."
"Give the application the ability to read your contacts."
"Access to your contacts is used for finding people to invite."
"This application requires a network connection for full functionality. Certain features may not work while there is no network connection."
"Are you sure you want to delete the event?"
"Please enter in name for the event"
"Please enter in description for the event"
"Please enter in date for the event"
"Please enter in start time for the event"
"Please enter in end time for the event"
"The end time cannot be before the start time"
"The description cannot be more than 200 characters"
"The device is too old to play the protected content."
"This device does not support the required DRM scheme"
"There was an error getting the stream information"
"You must specify a valid organization or business"
"Access to the camera, microphone, memory, and the network are used to record Live Streams for broadcasting."
"Permissions required for streaming have been granted."
"The app needs \"Camera\", \"Microphone\", \"Storage\", and \"Internet\" permission for Streaming. One or more of those permissions has been denied."

"By singing up to Conx2share you agree to our \nPrivacy Policy & Terms of Service"
Thank you for your report. A counselor has been alerted
Cannot switch anonymous mode to display your identity
Are you sure you want to exit anonymous mode? The counsellor will be able to see your name and profile picture.
Are you sure you want to exit? Your chat will end. You can start another chat later if you would like.
What would you like to do?
Start a text chat with your local counselor, share pictures and videos. You can leave the chat whenever you want.
Select this options to send a quick report to your local counselor, attach a picture or a video.
Your name and photo will not be visible for the counsellor. This can be turned off during a chat.
Counsellor will be able to see your name and your profile picture along with other information.
Use search to find \n and select your school.
Oops! Seems like we couldn’t\nfind your school.
Would you like to join this group?
Your request has been sent successfully
Cannot request to join this group.
Type the name of your school

The Say NO! program was created as a part of the Conx2share Foundation as an Anti-Bullying and Anti-Drug Abuse program.

 Being a Say NO! member enables you to report bullying or drug abuse incidents in a click.

 The Say NO! live chat allows you to chat live with a counselor if you are in need of help or wanting to report you peers being bullied.

 Join your school group or office peers by becoming a Say NO! member
Your request is still pending.\nYou will receive a notification as soon as it’s approved.
Your request to join to Say NO! group was declined.
Report bullying or drug abuse incidents in\na few clicks. They will be immediately\n addressed by your local counsellors.
Need help or advice? The Say NO! live chat\n allows you to chat with a counsellor and\n attach pictures or videos.
We give you an option to stay anonymous\n if you don’t feel like sharing your name and\n profile picture with us.
Congrats! You found your Favorites Bar!
Tap this star to add friends to your\nFavorites Bar for quick access. Try it now!
